definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: You came late to class, so you're not seeing the whole picture.
sentences.chinese: 你上學遲到了，以是你沒有瞅見工作的全數顛末。

sentences.english: The right-hander allowed the first four batters he faced to reach base.
sentences.chinese: 這位右投手再面對投四名打者，全數讓他們進站壘包。

sentences.english: All deposits for holiday cottages are refundable.
You can also globally enable or disable all key acceleration.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以整個開始使用或禁用全數鍵位加快。

sentences.english: Then the next year's crop and fleeces may repay you to the full.
sentences.chinese: 那麼盼望明年的收成和羊毛會全數給你作補償。

sentences.english: Now I have a test-after version of the perfect-number finder.
sentences.chinese: 現在我有了後測試版本的完全數查找程序。

sentences.english: All funds raised will be donated to Sowers Action to support the Foundation Education Development Program in China.
sentences.chinese: 所籌得捐款將全數作爲支持發展中國基礎教育之用。

sentences.english: On demand by the Government, I shall forthwith pay the Indebtedness in full .
sentences.chinese: 政府如提出要求，本人必須立即全數清還有關債項。

sentences.english: Full payment is required for a valid booking. Only cash is accepted.
sentences.chinese: 預訂必須作全數付款方爲確實，只接收現金付款。

sentences.english: When Chen Qizhen knew that the admission ticket total sells out, is affected, red eye socket .
sentences.chinese: 當陳綺貞得知門票全數售完，非常感動，紅了眼眶。

sentences.english: Today is Mother's Day and all the jewellery is on sale at Rich's.
sentences.chinese: 今日是媽媽節，瑞奇店的所有首飾全數折價發售。

sentences.english: An F. P. A. policy only covers you against total loss in the case of minor perils.
sentences.chinese: 安然險只有在發生較小危險時纔給保全數損失蹤險。
他們全數沒有預訂的嗎？

sentences.english: When starting this exploration of the problem, I decomposed it into several subtasks.
sentences.chinese: 在開始研究完全數問題時，我把它分解爲幾個子任務。

sentences.english: The proceeds will go to Amnesty International and other human rights organizations.
sentences.chinese: 拍賣所得將全數捐給國際特赦組織等人權團體。

sentences.english: Please wait for all page loading done, then click the picture you like.
sentences.chinese: 請等待頁面全數讀取完畢再行點閱縮圖觀賞。

definition: auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
unit (of measure)/unit (group of people as a whole)/work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)/CL:個|个[ge4]
